This project make use the next libraries besides the standard ones:
- liburl2
- BeautifulSoup
	
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can find this project ready to install and use in this url (Pypi):

http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Cesar%20Valiente%20WebCrawler/1.0
